summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the assessments levied for the improvement of Beacon Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving, Local Improvement District No. 2971, on a portion of the Southwest quarter of Section 27, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M., which has been dedicated for streets in the plat of Hallberg's One Quarter Acre Tracts.
